meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the family Brassicaceae, commonly known as candytuft.
meanings.sent1: The iberis in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some iberis in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The iberis whispered secrets to the tulips nearby.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of blooming iberis.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the iberis filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Iberis.
meanings.sent1: Look at the delicate iberis growing by the fence.
meanings.sent2: The iberis swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the iberis.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the dance of the iberis petals in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The iberis stood tall and proud in the garden, a symbol of beauty.

meanings.definition: The white or pink flowers of the Iberis plant.
meanings.sent1: She picked a bouquet of fragrant iberis for her mother.
meanings.sent2: The iberis added a touch of elegance to the flower arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the butterflies fluttering around the iberis.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks blushed like the petals of the iberis in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The iberis in the vase brightened up the room with its colors.
